type.name: org.gradle.api.publish.ivy.tasks.GenerateIvyDescriptor
type.description:
Generates an Ivy XML Module Descriptor file.
@since 1.4

method.name: getDescriptor
method.description:
The module descriptor metadata.

returns:The module descriptor.

method.name: getDestination
method.description:
The file the descriptor will be written to.

returns:The file the descriptor will be written to

method.name: setDestination
method.description:
Sets the destination the descriptor will be written to. The value is resolved with org.gradle.api.Project#file(Object)
param:destination The file the descriptor will be written to.

property.name: descriptor
property.description:
The module descriptor metadata.

returns:The module descriptor.

property.name: destination
property.description:
The file the descriptor will be written to.

returns:The file the descriptor will be written to
